items.text: A snail is like a tiny turtle, carrying its cozy shell wherever it goes!
While most people think of land snails, there are also colorful sea snails and playful freshwater snails!
If a gastropod has no shell, it’s a slug, but if it has a tiny shell, it’s a semi-slug!
